main event: Eight unidentified objects were sighted visually by a pilot over the Atlantic Ocean on 10/06/52.
interesting points: The sighting involved eight objects observed in two formations,The objects were reported to be flying south and appeared to be the same type, possibly tankers or freighters,The altitude of the sighting was approximately 8,000 feet,The report indicated that the objects were lighted at both the front and rear,Weather conditions were noted to be clear during the sighting.
